last_episode_to_air.name: Haute Couture
last_episode_to_air.overview: Edha makes a momentous decision about her brand. New evidence is presented for cases both old and new. Teo sets his sights on Milan.

name: Edha
overview: Revenge, passion and dark secrets push a successful fashion designer and single mother to her limits when she meets a handsome and mysterious man.

episodes.name: The Mark of Revenge
episodes.overview: As Edha's company comes under financial strain, her estranged ex returns to connect with their daughter. A woman comes between Teo and his brother.

episodes.name: The Seams from the Past
episodes.overview: Elena contemplates meeting up with her estranged father. Edha opens a workshop in her own home, despite her father's objections.

episodes.name: The Perfect Model
episodes.overview: Teo takes steps to implicate Edha's company in the sweatshop fire. Lorenzo chooses a target to take the fall for his family's business.

episodes.name: The Body Revealed
episodes.overview: Edha signs Teo as a model for her male clothing line while using him as her muse. Elena grapples with her guilt.

episodes.name: Second Skin
episodes.overview: Teo joins Edha in a fashion show competition that could save her company. Meanwhile, Elena and her friends find themselves in a dangerous situation.

episodes.name: In My Father's Memory
episodes.overview: Teo doubts the district attorney's intentions regarding the investigation. Aníbal makes a startling discovery.

episodes.name: The Path of Truth
episodes.overview: Edha begins to question the events surrounding her mother's suicide. Teo delves deeper into his search for answers about the sweatshop fire.

episodes.name: The Price of Silence
episodes.overview: Teo turns to Celia for help with his latest discovery. Lorenzo is offered a deal to protect Aníbal. Edha's trip to Milan is put in jeopardy.

episodes.name: The Alibi
episodes.overview: Edha learns the truth about her mother's death. Elena parties her troubles away. Celia gets involved in a risky operation tied to the trip to Milan.

episodes.name: Haute Couture
episodes.overview: Edha makes a momentous decision about her brand. New evidence is presented for cases both old and new. Teo sets his sights on Milan.
